title: Have a heart
creator_credit: Tantalus Films, Saul Rubin, Ken Plotin and Kaye Dyal
brief_description: Describes the function of the heart and circulatory system and emphasises the need for a healthy lifestyle to prevent heart disease. A heart attack victim is shown being given electric shock treatment. Suitable for lower secondary level.
